member.name: SYSTEM_LOGICAL_PROCESSOR_INFORMATION_EX
member.summary: Contains information about the relationships of logical processors and related hardware. The function uses this structure.

member.name: SYSTEM_LOGICAL_PROCESSOR_INFORMATION_EX.Relationship
member.summary: The type of relationship between the logical processors. This parameter can be one of the enumeration values.

member.name: SYSTEM_LOGICAL_PROCESSOR_INFORMATION_EX.DUMMYUNIONNAME.Processor
member.summary: A structure that describes processor affinity. This structure contains valid data only if the Relationship member is RelationProcessorCore, RelationProcessorDie, RelationProcessorModule or RelationProcessorPackage.

member.name: SYSTEM_LOGICAL_PROCESSOR_INFORMATION_EX.DUMMYUNIONNAME.NumaNode
member.summary: A structure that describes a NUMA node. This structure contains valid data only if the Relationship member is RelationNumaNode or RelationNumaNodeEx.

member.name: SYSTEM_LOGICAL_PROCESSOR_INFORMATION_EX.DUMMYUNIONNAME.Cache
member.summary: A structure that describes cache attributes. This structure contains valid data only if the Relationship member is RelationCache.

member.name: SYSTEM_LOGICAL_PROCESSOR_INFORMATION_EX.DUMMYUNIONNAME.Group
member.summary: A structure that contains information about the processor groups. This structure contains valid data only if the Relationship member is RelationGroup.
